title: Who has to pay minimum 2K income tax?
details: People will need to show the proof of submission of return of Tk2,000 minimum tax to avail 38 various services. The proposed national budget for FY24 includes a policy where people may have to pay Tk2,000 as minimum income tax from the next fiscal year to avail 38 government services, even if they do not have taxable income.

title: Daisy Jones & the Six is a blueprint for delicious holiday style
details: Arock’n’roll saga of love triangles, cocaine and tour buses might not sound of immediate relevance to your real-life summer holiday. Or hey, maybe it does – no judgment! Either way, if you haven’t watched Daisy Jones & the Six, the Amazon Prime ten-parter, then I’m here to tell you that you really, really should. Mainly you should watch it because it is just so much fun. Sexy, gripping, atmospheric, the sofa-viewing equivalent of a perfect sunlounger summer novel. (It is based on Taylor Jenkins Reid’s perfect sunlounger read of the same name.) But specifically you should watch it for its wardrobe, because it is a blueprint for the most delicious summer-holiday style.

title: Argentina’s Lionel Messi keen on rejoining Barcelona, says father
details: Barca were forced to let their talisman leave in 2021 because his high wages coupled with strict LaLiga financial rules could have jeopardised the club's future. Lionel Messi, who last week played his last game for Paris St Germain, is open to making a return to LaLiga side Barcelona, the Argentine forward’s father said on Monday. Barca were forced to let their talisman leave in 2021 because his high wages coupled with strict LaLiga financial rules could have jeopardised the club’s future.

title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu gives a peek into the ‘best’ days of her Turkey trip. See photos
details: Samantha Ruth Prabhu, who went to Turkey for the shoot of Kushi with Vijay Deverakonda, has also been touring the country for the past one week. Actor Samantha Ruth Prabhu, along with Vijay Deverakonda and the team of their upcoming film Kushi, went to Turkey a few days ago. On Monday, Samantha gave a sneak peek into the best moments of her trip. Though she had gone to Turkey for the shoot of the rom-com, looks like it turned into a workcation for her.

title: Bangladesh wants to know about India’s Akhand Bharat map
details: A map of “Akhand Bharat” has been installed in the Parliament of India. Bangladesh and some other countries are shown on that map. State Minister for Foreign Affairs Md Shahriar Alam said that the Bangladesh Embassy in Delhi has been instructed to contact the country's Ministry of External Affairs to get India's official explanation on this matter.Shahriar Alam told reporters at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Monday afternoon: “There is no reason to express doubts about it. However, for further clarification, we have asked the mission in Delhi to speak to the Indian Ministry of External Affairs to find out what their official explanation is.

title: When will loadshedding occur in DPDC areas on Tuesday?
details: Areas include Azimpur, Dhanmondi, Motijheel and Narayanganj State Minister for Power, Energy and Mineral Resources Nasrul Hamid on July 18 confirmed that hourlong nationwide loadshedding would start from the next day to minimize energy subsidies.

title: Bangladeshi killed in BSF firing along Lalmonirhat border
details: A flag meeting will be held with the border security forces of India and Bangladesh to ascertain why the shooting took place, BGB official say. A Bangladeshi youth was shot dead by members of Indian Border Security Force (BSF) along the Kalirhat border at Patgram upazila of Lalmonirhat district early Monday.

title: Saudi Arabian soccer league to get more state funding from policy backed by crown prince MBS
details: Saudi Arabia's push to attract the world's best players entered another phase Monday when the sovereign wealth Public Investment Fund took a majority ownership stake in four of the country's top clubs, including Ronaldo's Al Nassr. Cristiano Ronaldo is already in Saudi Arabia. Karim Benzema looks sure to be next. And as the oil-rich kingdom pursues Lionel Messi as well, it is making sure that money continues to flow into the domestic soccer league.

title: Body with gunshot wounds found near Dinajpur border
details: The police are unsure about who killed the young man The police recovered the body of a young man with four gunshot wounds from the border area near Sahapur Kamarpara under Chirirbandar upazila of Dinajpur early on Wednesday. The deceased was Manjurul Islam, son of Mojibor Rahman from Patharipara in the upazila. Lt Col Alamgir Kabir, commanding officer of BGB-29 Battalion, said locals had spotted Manjurul's body along the Bangladesh-India border and informed the police.

title: Nasrul: Electricity supply will be normal within 2 weeks
details: Nasrul Hamid said prices of all types of fuels including gas, coal and furnace oil have skyrocketed in the international market. Mentioning that everybody across the country is suffering due to the ongoing load shedding, State Minister for Power, Energy and Mineral Resources Nasrul Hamid on Monday expressed optimism that the supply of electricity will be normal within the next two weeks.

title: I’m happy the shoulder bag is back. Now I need to relearn how to wear one
details: It’s time to ditch the cross body satchel for a more chic shoulder bag – but you’ll have to pack light. The last time we bought a family car, a decade ago now, we got an automatic one instead of a manual one. So much easier to drive. A no-brainer, really. But I completely failed to anticipate, somehow, that by switching to an automatic I would forget how to use gears. I deskilled myself by accident.

title: Payra power plant closed, coal will take 20-22 days to arrive
details: The outstanding amount for coal until April of this year stands at approximately $390 million. The Payra power plant came to a complete halt in electricity production around 12pm on Monday due to the depletion of coal reserves caused by the ongoing dollar crisis.

title: Sakshi Malik joins work but protest to go on
details: Sakshi Malik and Bajrang Punia deemed news of withdrawing from wrestlers' protest as rumour. Sakshi Malik, on Monday, responded to media reports claiming she withdrew from the ongoing wrestlers’ protest against WFI President Brij Bhushan Sharan Singh and categorically stated that the ‘fight for justice’ will continue.

title: How extensive scouting and diligent scouts have made Mumbai Indians the superstar team they are
details: Before the 2022 IPL auction, Mumbai Indians management was in two minds, whether to release the uncapped Akash Madhwal. The coaches sought feedback of talent scouts, and one of them insisted on giving him more time to blossom. Before the Indian Premier League auction in 2022, the Mumbai Indians team management was in two minds, whether to release uncapped medium pacer Akash Madhwal. Their dilemma was understandable, the seamer had not quite set domestic cricket on fire. At the age of 28 then, he was not too young either.

title: Shop talk: Britain and Ireland’s 20 best independent boutiques
details: From upcycled floral dresses to cutting-edge style, these small independent businesses have something for everyone. That are also sprinkled with all the extras that make a look your own, from Mishky bracelets (from £19) to bold sweaters from American Vintage (from £110), completing an edit that is bursting with special pieces that be able to pull out year after year. kiticymru.com; @kiticymru

title: Sabalenka-Svitolina clash brings Russia-Ukraine conflict
details: It follows Djokovic's support for Serbs in Kosovo & Khachanov conveying political message. Press conferences and the French Open do not make for a healthy combination. In 2021, Naomi Osaka caused major controversy after she decided to snub post-match press obligations to protect her mental health, following which mental strife and injury brought the career of the four-time Major champion to a halt. Two years on, on Sunday, Belarus’ Aryna Sabalenka got past a tetchy fourth-round encounter against Sloane Stephens, and then skipped the obligatory press conference for the second time in succession. Sabalenka’s reasons were the same as Osaka, but have been part of a wider headache for organisers throughout the event.

title: ‘Tortured’ on the set: ‘There’s a lot of negativity’
details: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah actor Monika Bhadoriya said that even after she quit the show, her payment was not cleared for more than a year. Popular TV sitcom Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah (TMKOC) has been in the soup after one of its actors accused producer Asit Modi of harassment. Now, actor Monika Bhadoriya, who played the role of Baga’s love interest Bawri, has opened up about the toxic environment on the show’s set and how her payment was delayed by the makers for more than a year.

title: Kartik Aaryan, Kiara Advani battle heartbreaking ‘truth’ in the musical romance
details: Starring Kartik Aaryan and Kiara Advani in the lead roles, Satyaprem Ki Katha is helmed by Sameer Vidwans and will hit screens on June 29. Is it even true love, if it doesn’t have a crushing truth hidden from everyone? The makers of the highly anticipated Satyaprem Ki Katha released the musical romantic film’s trailer on Monday. The movie, starring Kartik Aaryan and Kiara Advani in the lead roles, is set to hit screens on June 29.

title: Hollywood directors reach labour pact, writers remain on strike
details: The agreement includes gains in wages and residuals plus guardrails around the use of artificial intelligence, according to the DGA and the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers (AMPTP). Hollywood’s major studios reached a tentative labour agreement with the union representing film and television directors, likely averting a work stoppage that would have piled pressure on media companies to settle with striking writers.

title: Makeup or skincare? No need to choose
details: Cosmetic products with benefits. Plus, lotions and serums to cleanse and soothe. Nothing sits as long on or as close to your skin as makeup. Yet, for the longest time, most makeup products were created with zero benefit to the skin. Thankfully, that is changing. There are now mascaras that condition and strengthen your lashes, lipsticks infused with peptides and hyaluronic acid, and foundations, like Laura Mercier’s latest, which is chock full of antioxidants that treat everything from fine lines to dark spots. You shouldn’t have to compromise on skincare for a bit of colour.

title: Nawazuddin Siddiqui’s estranged wife Aaliya says she has found happiness again
details: Nawazuddin Siddiqui's former wife Aaliya Siddiqui has shared a picture of herself with an unnamed man and has revealed that their relationship is beyond friendship. Bollywood actor Nawazuddin Siddiqui’s estranged wife Aaliya recently penned a note on Instagram about finding happiness again in life. She posted a picture of herself with an unidentified man and wrote about moving out of a relationship she treasured for a long time in her life. Aaliya and Nawazuddin are currently undergoing the divorce procedure and are living separately.

title: Kangana Ranaut shares old video with Salman Khan, asks, ‘SK, why do we look so young?’
details: Kangana Ranaut shared an old video in which she is seen dancing on Salman Khan's show Dus Ka Dum. Actor Kangana Ranaut has shared a throwback video from the time when she appeared on Salman Khan’s TV reality show, Dus Ka Dum. While sharing the video, Kangana wondered how young both of them once looked.

title: Rise of the tourdrobe: how Beyoncé’s gigs are the new designer catwalk
details: From underneath a giant screen of rolling, pink, fluffy clouds and a plume of grey mist, Beyoncé slowly ascends on to her Renaissance stage. A month into her global tour – her first in seven years – the first outfit has been different each night. There’s been a crystal-embroidered Alexander McQueen bodysuit in Stockholm, a glittering silver Paco Rabanne mini-dress in Paris, a floor-sweeping Valentino ivory gown in Cardiff, and last week in London, a bright blue, wired skirt from London-based designer Roksanda Ilinčić. The dazzling looks keep coming throughout the concert – with glittering fringing, sequinned thigh-high boots and holographic prints just a few of the many highlights.

title: How to get the quiet luxury look without the vulgar price tag
details: A well-ironed white T-shirt tucked into dark jeans hits the right understated note – and there’s no need to pay through the nose for it. You will have heard, by now, about “quiet luxury”, which has (quietly) established itself as the dominant aesthetic* of 2023. (*Explainer: we don’t say “trend” any more. Aesthetic sounds a bit less … basic? Capitalist? But to be clear, in a fashion context it means pretty much the same thing.)
